promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic basic lion dark-type pokemon with golden claws. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or lion. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Goldencryptor, a a gigantic basic lion dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Dark Roar, Prominence-GX. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lion", "dark" or "Goldencryptor". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, lion-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: This cryptic predator thrives in shadowed crypts, using its echoing roar to confound foes. Notorious for the gleaming, golden fur that can stun opponents.
